price: 164. Ma jiro mid naga mid ah (malaa’igta) aan lahayn meel lagu og yahay 20.
arabic: وَمَا مِنَّآ إِلَّا لَهُۥ مَقَامٞ مَّعۡلُومٞ
footnotes: 20. Cibaado ahaan, ama ma jiro mid aan lahayn howl la yaqaan uu qabto.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wamā minnā illā lahu maqāmun maʿlūmun
